item.title: Will Minecraft Beat The Super Mario Bros. Movie's Record $1.3 Billion Box Office Next?
item.description: A Minecraft Movie has the highest domestic opening weekend for a video game movie but beating Mario's $1.36 worldwide box office record won't be easy.
